answers.author: Robert Woods
answers.text:
You might look for energy efficiency grants as a vehicle. 
We took a bunch of stand-alone servers and consolidated them into a single box running virtual servers, as a means to reduce energy consumption.

author: Unknown
text: Is there any grant money available from any source for upgrading a City's computer servers?
title: Money for Servers
